alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 6:41PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Prowers, south central Kiowa and northeastern Bent Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 641 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles west of Sweetwater Reservoir to near McClave to near Hasty. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lamar, Wiley, McClave, Hasty, Neegronda Reservoir, John Martin Reservoir, Queens Reservoir and Caddoa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Western Kiowa County
